258260.「……すごく きれい！\n スケッチのしがいが あるわ。:
...It's so beautiful! I can't wait to start
sketching.

258262.「ユシュカ！ それに アンルシアさんも。\n ふたりとも いったい どうしたの？:
Yushka! And Anlucia. Is there something the
matter?

258263.「俺も アストルティアに咲く 桜って花を\n 見てみたくてな。……また アスバル:
I also wanted to see the cherry blossoms
blooming in Astoltia. Asbal would probably say
I was missing out if I didn't.

258264.「カミハルムイの桜は ステキよね。\n 私たちも ご一緒して いいかしら？:
The cherry blossoms in Kamiharmui are
beautiful. Do you mind if we join you?

258266.「……すごい！\n イルーシャさんって 絵を描くのが\n とっても 上手なのね。: Wow! Irusha, you are very good at drawing.

258267.「ありがとう……ちょっと 恥ずかしいけど。: Thank you... I'm a little embarrassed.

258268.「そうだ。\n アンルシアさんも 絵を描いてみない？:
Oh, yes. Would you like to try your hand at
drawing, Anlucia?

258270.「じつは……子供のころ 兄にプレゼントした\n 犬の絵を 上手なオニオーンだねっ:
Actually... when I was little, my brother
praised me for a drawing of an Ornery Onion I
made as a present for him...

258271.「創世の女神サマ……なんて\n 大層な存在だとは 思えないよな。:
I don't really see her as a big deal like an
almighty Goddess of Creation...

258272.「絵を描いたり 笑ったり……。\n ああやってると どこにでもいる\n 普通の女:
Drawing pictures, laughing... when I see her
like that, she's just like any other woman.

258273.「……なあ。\n あいつは 本当に 女神ルティアナなのか？\n イルーシャは イ:
...Hey. Is she really the Goddess Lutiana? Is
Irusha not just Irusha...?

258274.「俺たちは フィネトカに戻るよ。\n 神殺しの秘技の修行も\n そろそろ 最後の:
We're going back to Finetka. It's almost time
for the final part of our training to learn
the secrets of godslaying.

258275.「じゃあね イルーシャさん……\n じゃなくて イルーシャ！ <pc>も！:
Bye, Ms. Ir... I mean, Irusha! You too,
<pc>!

258277.「とても いい絵が描けたし アンルシアとも\n おしゃべりができて 楽しかったわ:
I had a great time drawing and chatting with
Anlucia. Thanks for bringing me here!

258278.「あと もう１か所だけ 付き合ってくれる？\n 最後に 海が描きたいの。\n 魔:
Can you take me to just one more spot? I want
to draw the ocean. The blue sea that doesn't
exist in the Demon World...

258279.「キラキラ海岸の 東の小島は\n 人が少なくて 静かだから 絵を描くのに\n ち:
I heard the islet to the east of Kyoo-lana
Beach is quiet and uncrowded, so it seems like
a good place to paint.

258280.「……え？\n キラキラ海岸なんて 知らない……って？:
...Huh? You've never heard of Kyoo-lana
Beach...?

258281.「アスバルがそう言っていたと 思うんだけど……\n 聞き間違いだったのかも。キラ:
I thought that's what Asbal called it... but
maybe I misheard. Do you know of any places
with a name close to "Kyoo-lana Beach"?

258282.「……できた！\n アストルティアの この青い海を 絵に描けたら\n とっても:
...It's done! I always thought it would be
amazing if I could draw the blue seas of
Astoltia!

258283.「これで 行きたかった場所には すべて\n 行けたわ。いろんなところへ\n 連れ:
Now I've been to all the places I wanted to
go. Thank you for taking me to all these
places.

258284.「……あっ！ <pc> ごめんなさい。\n やっぱり もう少しだけ 待ってもらっ:
...Ah! I'm sorry, <pc>. Can you
wait a little bit longer? I'd like to try
taking a dip in the ocean.

258285.「……砂浜は 歩きにくくて\n 波は 気持ちいいのね。\n 知らなかったわ……。:
...The beach is rough to walk on, yet the
waves are so soothing. I had no idea...

258290.「ごっ ごめんなさい。\n おかしくって……。: I'm sorry. It's just so funny...

258291.「海の水って しょっぱいのね。ふふっ。\n まだまだ 知らないことばかり…………:
Sea water is so salty... Hehe.
There's still so much I don't know...

258293.「本当は……消えてしまうなんて怖い。\n もっと いろんなことを 知りたい。\n:
To be honest, the thought of disappearing...it
terrifies me. There's still so much I want to
know. I don't want to leave everyone.

258294.「<pc>と……\n ずっと 一緒にいたい……！: I want to be with you forever...!

258296.「この美しい世界も そこに住む人たちも\n 大好きよ。みんなを救えるなら 私は\:
I love this beautiful world and the people who
live in it. I would gladly give my body to the
River of Light if I could save them all.

258297.「付き合ってくれて ありがとう。\n そろそろ フィネトカに戻りましょう。:
Thanks for staying with me. It's time to get
back to Finetka.

258298.「スケッチに 色を塗って\n 絵を 完成させなくちゃね。:
I have to color my sketches so I can finish
my drawings.

259200.「女神の祠を巡ったからか……感じるの。\n アストルティアは 創生のチカラに満ち:
Maybe it's because I've been to the shrines of
the Goddess... but I can feel it. Astoltia is
full of the power of creation.
